hero.heading: Customer Service
hero.subheading: We're here to help you with all your leasing and fleet management needs

intro.title: How Can We Help You?
intro.paragraph1: At Innolease, we're committed to providing exceptional customer service. Our team of experts is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns regarding your vehicle leasing arrangements and fleet management.
intro.paragraph2: Whether you need assistance with maintenance scheduling, billing inquiries, or contract information, we're just a phone call or message away.

supportCategories.description: Our customer service team is specialized in various areas to provide you with expert assistance for any issue you might encounter.

leasing.title: Leasing Support
leasing.description: Get help with contract terms, leasing options, and end-of-lease arrangements.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Services
maintenance.description: Schedule maintenance, tire changes, or inspections for your leased vehicles.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Assistance with invoices, payment options, and financial questions.

accounts.title: Account Management
accounts.description: Help with your InnoFleet Manager account, user access, and settings.

offices.title: Our Offices
offices.description: Visit us at one of our office locations across Finland for face-to-face assistance.

contactForm.title: Get in Touch
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

contactForm.privacyConsent: I consent to Innolease processing my data according to the Privacy Policy.

faq.question1: What information should I have ready when contacting customer service?
faq.answer1: It's helpful to have your contract number, vehicle details, and any relevant documentation ready when contacting us for faster assistance.
faq.question2: How quickly can I expect a response to my inquiry?
faq.answer2: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. Urgent matters are prioritized and typically addressed within a few hours.
faq.question3: Can I schedule maintenance through customer service?
faq.answer3: Yes, our customer service team can help you schedule maintenance services, tire changes, and inspections for your leased vehicles at our partner service centers.
